title: [Gameplay] Lulu/Pix Bug
body:
There is currently a bug with Pix on the current PBE patch.

Pix can take skill shots like lee sin q, annie stun and other skills.

When lulu dies and you attack pix he will die respawn over and over giving you 25g each time.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We're currently investigating the issue. 

To report bugs occurring on PBE in the future, please use the [PBE boards](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/). :]
